name: Spirit of Water
effect: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
flavor: Convalescing waves cascade through the soul, revitalizing the body and mind from the depths.

editions.flavor: The leyline buried in Krustal shatters awake again, infusing dauntless souls with freezing clarity.
The leyline buried in Krustal shatters awake again, infusing dauntless souls with freezing clarity.
The tides and waves thrash again as serpent and tortoise entwined awaken from their slumber.

name: Spirit of Wind
effect: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
flavor: Turbulent zephyrs swirl around the soul, inspiring fleet-footed dreams and expedited efficiency.

editions.flavor: The leyline encircling Winbless surges forward, invigorating curious souls with a spark of ingenuity.
The leyline encircling Winbless surges forward, invigorating curious souls with a spark of ingenuity.
Auspicious fortune and good tidings follow the silver tiger on its fleet-footed journey through seasons.

name: Jin, Fate Defiant
effect: Inherited Effect — Whenever Jin attacks with a Polearm weapon and/or Polearm attack card, target Horse or Human ally you control gets +1 until end of turn. (Your champion has this ability as long as this card is part of its lineage.)
effect_raw: Inherited Effect — Whenever Jin attacks with a Polearm weapon and/or Polearm attack card, target Horse or Human ally you control gets +1 power until end of turn. (Your champion has this ability as long as this card is part of its lineage.)

result_editions.flavor: "Why fight to die when you can fight to live?"

editions.flavor: "Why fight to die when you can fight to live?"
"Why fight to die when you can fight to live?"

name: Jin, Zealous Maverick
effect: Jin Lineage (Jin, Zealous Maverick must be leveled from a previous level "Jin" champion.) On Enter: Jin's next attack this turn gets +1 and has "On Attack: Wake up Jin."
effect_raw:
Jin Lineage (Jin, Zealous Maverick must be leveled from a previous level "Jin" champion.) 

On Enter: Jin's next attack this turn gets +1 power and has "On Attack: Wake up Jin."

result_editions.flavor: "Unfortunately for you, I have something to fight for."

editions.flavor: "Unfortunately for you, I have something to fight for."
"Unfortunately for you, I have something to fight for."

name: Jin, Undying Resolve
effect: Jin Lineage As long as it's not your end phase, Jin has immortality. (A unit with immortality can't die.)
effect_raw:
Jin Lineage 

As long as it's not your end phase, Jin has immortality. (A unit with immortality can't die.)

rule.description: A champion with immortality won't die for having more damage counters on them than their life stat.

result_editions.flavor: "For the first time, I have never felt more alive!"
"For the first time, I have never felt more alive!"

editions.flavor: "For the first time, I have never felt more alive!"
"For the first time, I have never felt more alive!"
"For the first time, I have never felt more alive!"

name: Kongming, Wayward Maven
effect: On Enter: You gain the Shifting Currents mastery. (Players can only have one mastery. The Shifting Currents mastery has four modes: North, South, East, and West. Some cards benefit from certain directions of Shifting Currents. Starts in the North direction.)
effect_raw: On Enter: You gain the Shifting Currents mastery. (Players can only have one mastery. The Shifting Currents mastery has four modes: North, South, East, and West. Some cards benefit from certain directions of Shifting Currents. Starts in the North direction.)

rule.description: Shifting Mastery is not an object and cannot be targeted by any effects.

result_editions.flavor: "A lily pad is but a weed in a pond of lotuses."

editions.flavor: "A lily pad is but a weed in a pond of lotuses."
"A lily pad is but a weed in a pond of lotuses."

name: Kongming, Ascetic Vice
effect: Kongming Lineage (Kongming, Ascetic Vice must be leveled from a previous level "Kongming" champion.) On Enter: Empower 3. Inherited Effect — Whenever your Shifting Currents change from facing North to South, draw a card.
effect_raw:
Kongming Lineage (Kongming, Ascetic Vice must be leveled from a previous level "Kongming" champion.) 

On Enter: Empower 3.

Inherited Effect — Whenever your Shifting Currents change from facing North to South, draw a card.

name: Kongming, Fel Eidolon
effect: Kongming Lineage On Enter: recover X, where X is the amount of tera element cards in your banishment. Whenever you activate a Spell card, you may change the direction of your Shifting Currents to an adjacent direction of your choice.
effect_raw: Kongming Lineage On Enter: recover X, where X is the amount of tera element cards in your banishment. Whenever you activate a Spell card, you may change the direction of your Shifting Currents to an adjacent direction of your choice.

rule.description: Changing adjacent directions means the currents can only go one step in a cardinal direction. For example, north can go either east or west whereas east can only go north or south.

name: Bauble of Abundance
effect: Banish Bauble of Abundance: Each player draws a card.
effect_raw: Banish Bauble of Abundance: Each player draws a card.
flavor: Glittering trinkets, coins, and treasures. Plenty enough to be shared among friend and foe alike.

result_editions.flavor: The imperial treasury lies unclaimed. Both avaricious and ambitious covet the wealth hidden within.

editions.flavor: The imperial treasury lies unclaimed. Both avaricious and ambitious covet the wealth hidden within.

name: Executioner's Spear
effect: (Weapon — Enters the field with two durability counters. Weapons allow your champion to perform an attack, and can be used along with an attack card.) Jin BonusOn Kill: Put a durability counter on Executioner's Spear. (Apply this effect only if your champion is Jin.)
effect_raw:
(Weapon — Enters the field with two durability counters. Weapons allow your champion to perform an attack, and can be used along with an attack card.)
[Jin Bonus] On Kill: Put a durability counter on Executioner's Spear. (Apply this effect only if your champion is Jin.)

rule.description: A durability counter is removed on the resolution of the damage step. Before the On Kill ability of Executioner's Spear resolves, the weapon is checked for destruction due to zero durability counters.

name: Fan of Seven Debts
effect: On Enter: Draw a card. Kongming BonusBanish Fan of Seven Debts: Change the direction of your Shifting Currents to a different direction of your choice.
effect_raw:
On Enter: Draw a card.
[Kongming Bonus] Banish Fan of Seven Debts: Change the direction of your Shifting Currents to a different direction of your choice.
flavor: Innocent wishes sway like a snow crane's feathers.

result_editions.flavor: Innocent wishes sway like a snow crane's feathers.

editions.flavor: Innocent wishes sway like a snow crane's feathers.

name: Life Essence Amulet
effect: Whenever an ally you control dies while it's not your turn, you may banish Life Essence Amulet. If you do, draw a card.
effect_raw: Whenever an ally you control dies while it's not your turn, you may banish Life Essence Amulet. If you do, draw a card.
flavor:
"It is said a great alchemist made this amulet for his lover should she be at death's door."
— Gildas, Chronicler of Aesa

result_editions.flavor:
"An occultist's desperate pursuit for immortality. However, what came back was but only a husk."
– Si Ma Hui, Hermit Sage

editions.flavor:
"An occultist's desperate pursuit for immortality. However, what came back was but only a husk."
– Si Ma Hui, Hermit Sage

"An alchemist's impossible wish to bring his dearly departed beloved back from the other side."
— Astarte, Celestial Dawn

name: Safeguard Amulet
effect: Banish Safeguard Amulet: If your champion would take non-combat damage this turn, prevent 4 of that damage.
effect_raw: Banish Safeguard Amulet: If your champion would take non-combat damage this turn, prevent 4 of that damage.

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: 'Whenever your champion would take non-attack damage this turn' -> 'If your champion would take non-attack damage this turn'

flavor: Hopefully enough to block a fatal spell.

name: Shard of Empowerment
effect: Banish Shard of Empowerment: Empower 2. (The next Spell card you activate this turn activates and resolves as if your champion got +2 level.)
effect_raw: Banish Shard of Empowerment: Empower 2. (The next Spell card you activate this turn activates and resolves as if your champion got +2 level.)
flavor: A fragment of a legendary crystal lost to time. Its power is rumored to be beyond mortal control.

name: Tariff Ring
effect: Banish Tariff Ring: Until end of turn, players can't declare attacks unless they pay 2for each attack declaration. Activate this ability only during an opponent's recollection phase.
effect_raw: Banish Tariff Ring: Until end of turn, players can't declare attacks unless they pay 2for each attack declaration. Activate this ability only during an opponent's recollection phase.

rule.description: The (2) in Tariff Ring's attack condition is a reserve cost, and can be paid by resting objects with reservable.

flavor: If profits are to be made, bring enough to share.

result_editions.flavor: The Mandate of Heaven stops even steel.

editions.flavor: The Mandate of Heaven stops even steel.

effect: Banish Sweet Ambrosia: Recover 3. (To recover, remove that many damage counters from your champion.)
effect_raw: Banish Sweet Ambrosia: Recover 3. (To recover, remove that many damage counters from your champion.)

effect: Class BonusFor every five damage counters on your champion, Shuang Ji of Sacrifice gets +1 . On Enter: You may have Shuang Ji of Sacrifice deal 5 unpreventable damage to your champion. If you do, draw a card.

On Enter: You may have Shuang Ji of Sacrifice deal 5 unpreventable damage to your champion. If you do, draw a card.

name: Coronal of Rejuvenation
effect: As an additional cost to materialize this card, banish a preserved card from your material deck. On Enter: Banish any amount of Spell cards from your graveyard. : You may play a card banished by Coronal of Rejuvenation. Activate this ability only at slow speed.
effect_raw:
As an additional cost to materialize this card, banish a preserved card from your material deck.
On Enter: Banish any amount of Spell cards from your graveyard.
[REST]: You may play a card banished by Coronal of Rejuvenation. Activate this ability only at slow speed.

rule.description: You may play the card was was banished for the materialization cost with the rest ability. This is also true for any floating memory or cards in memory used to pay for its materialization costs.

name: Entrancing Filigree
effect: On Enter: As a Spell, banish target non-champion object you don't control. (Spell abilities can't target objects with spellshroud.) On Leave: Return the banished object to the field under its owner's control rested.
effect_raw:
On Enter: As a Spell, banish target non-champion object you don't control. (Spell abilities can't target objects with spellshroud.)

effect: Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
effect_raw: Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)

editions.flavor: The collapse of the reigning dynasty has left a power vacuum, open for any warlord or general to grasp.
"I will carve out my legacy into Aesan soil with steel. Let this bloodshed sate this endless hunger for war."
